title: Occurrence of fungal microbial contamination in drinking water of megacity of Karachi (Pakistan) and their physico-chemical control
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Faisal Hussain, Iram-us Salam, Farzana, Zaibun-nisa Memon, Muhammad Abdullah, Ghulam Abbas, Muhammad Akbar, Alamdar Hussain, Muhammad Majeed, Kishwar Ali, Haruna Musa Moda
